Description: Papyrus with 7 lines of a Demotic text written on recto and 16 on verso.
Curator's comments: Dated year 24 of Ptolemy V Epiphanes - bill of sale for house in thebes, sekh-r-djeba-hedj.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1990a / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum IV: Ptolemaic Legal Texts from the Theban Area (p41-2, pl.28-9, 32)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (2756) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/2756)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: cockled, fractured, loss Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: some cracks
Associated names: Named in inscription: Ptolemy V Epiphanes
